content.rendered: Karthik John, Sr. Sales Engineer from KIMMCO ISOVER conducted a comprehensive training for TTE Products & Solutions’ sales team at the HQ. The session was to brief the team on Kimmco’s pre-insulated duct, Climaver and enhance team’s expertise by delving into nuances, applications, and customer benefits, enabling TTE to better serve its clients with their environment-friendly ducts. TTE is the authorized fabricator for Climaver in the UAE and the collaboration exemplifies its commitment to staying at the forefront of industry knowledge, ensuring that clients receive top-notch service and products.
